title: ShinyStarPrincess
author: ShinyStarPrincess
content: A little Introduction:In Q1 of 2023, REELT Token was listed on Bitget, after that, huge selling pressure arrived and the token suffered a dump. The Exchange froze the accounts of multiple advisors of this project, including Evan Luthra for possible lewd maneuvers or better said, Â a Rugpulled intention.Further, the Indian KOL started to fud against the CEX, repeatedly talking about scams and creating FUD pressure for almost 6 months straight, but finally, on 08/09/2023 Evan tweeted this https://x.com/EvanLuthra/status/1700041938387578975?s=20 Putting a good ending to this conflict and making Peace with Bitget Global. The KOL recognized he was blinded by his emotions and apologized to the platform, Gracy Chen, and the REELT victims.Not only that, Both Gracy and Evan took a picture at the EmpoweX Summit event reassuring the peace between both. Things we like to see in the crypto space.
